title: Annual Health Awareness Camp
description: A free health camp focusing on general health checkups, blood donation, and medical consultation.

title: Yoga Day Celebration
description: Join us for a day of yoga and wellness in the park to celebrate International Yoga Day.

title: Local Farmers Market
description: Support local farmers and buy fresh produce directly from the farm. A great way to eat healthy and support small businesses.

title: Community Clean-Up Drive
description: Be part of the community effort to clean up our streets, parks, and public spaces. Help us make a difference!

title: Art Exhibition by Local Artists
description: Explore a variety of artworks created by talented local artists. A great opportunity to appreciate and purchase art.

title: Food Festival
description: Enjoy a variety of cuisines at the annual food festival. A great event for food lovers of all ages.
